title: Google\Cloud\BareMetalSolution\V2\UpdateNfsShareRequest
name: UpdateNfsShareRequest
description:
Message requesting to updating a NFS share.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.baremetalsolution.v2.UpdateNfsShareRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data

params.name: data.nfs_share
params.description: Required. The NFS share to update. The name field is used to identify the NFS share to update. Format: projects/{project}/locations/{location}/nfsShares/{nfs_share}

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: The list of fields to update. The only currently supported fields are: labels
